data.title: Tejasswi To Sonarika: TV Actresses Who Became Famous In Religious Shows
data.meta_description: Popular TV actresses who are famous for their pitch-perfect portrayal of religious and mythological characters. Here is a list of actresses who depicted their divine roles and are now well known celebrities.
data.text:
Did you know that some of the most famous celebrities in the television industry rose to fame in popular religious shows? You must have heard about Mouni Roy who played the character of Goddess Parvati in the show 'Devon Ke Dev Mahadev' and Mohit Raina who portrayed Lord Shiva on screen. These stars quickly became famous thanks to fans who showered them with immense love for their depiction of gods and goddesses on screen.

Also Read: Bollywood Films On Extraordinary Women Characters

Even the veteran generation of Deepika and Arun Govil owe their popularity to religious shows which extended to people almost worshiping them. Here take a look at the actress who rose to fame after playing characters of gods and goddesses in TV shows.

Bigg Boss 15 winner Tejasswi Prakash is currently in the news for her portrayal of Naagin in Ekta Kapoor's show. Earlier, she played the role of Uruvi in the Star Plus show Karansangini.

Mouni Roy remains one of the most famous Naagins of all time. However, she has portrayed the role of... Read More

Mouni Roy remains one of the most famous Naagins of all time. However, she has portrayed the role of Sati - Parvati in the popular mythological show Devon Ke Dev Mahadev opposite Mohit Raina.

Read Less

Sonarika rose to fame after she played the role of Goddess Parvati in Devon Ke Dev Mahadev show. How... Read More

Sonarika rose to fame after she played the role of Goddess Parvati in Devon Ke Dev Mahadev show. However, this character is depicted by different celebrities but, Sonarika kept her charm and portrayed the role in the most dignified way.

Read Less

Debina Bonnerjee played the role of Sita in the mythological show Ramayan that starred Gurmeet Choudhary as Ram.

Pooja Sharma splendidly portrayed the character of Draupadi in Star Plus show Mahabharat. She was showered with immense love and praise for her role.

Mallika Singh played the role of Goddess Radha in the hit series Radha Krishn. She rose to fame after playing Radha on screen.

(To get the latest updates from Bollywood and Hollywood, keep reading Indiatimes Entertainment.)
